abstract: A House committee is demanding to see Timothy F. Geithner’s e-mails, phone logs and meeting notes from when he was president of the Federal Reserve Bank of New York in late 2008 and the American International Group was bailed out.
snippet: A House committee is demanding to see Timothy F. Geithner’s e-mails, phone logs and meeting notes from when he was president of the Federal Reserve Bank of New York in late 2008 and the American International Group was bailed out.
lead_paragraph: What was Timothy F. Geithner thinking when the American International Group was bailed out? The House Oversight and Government Reform Committee wants to know.

headline.main: House Panel Demands Geithner’s A.I.G. Records

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York

keywords.value: House Oversight and Government Reform Committee
